question: In which city the 1st community toilet for third gender was inagurated?
explanation: Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister, Mr.Shivraj Singh Chouhan inaugurated a community toilet for third gender, in the Mangalwara area, Bhopal. This is the first community toilet for exclusive third gender usage in India. It was built at a cost of Rs.35 lakh. It also has a change/make-up room. Different signs for men, women, handicapped and transgender people are put on the doors of the toilet.
